message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really love. I'm offering it to you for $120. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $80 is just a little too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $95.  What do you think?
I appreciate you coming down to $95, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
